subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaisalmer?
question_hi: जयसालमर में कौन सा महत्तावना है।
explanation_en: Jaisalmer Fort, also known as Sonar Quila (The Golden Fort), is a famous fort located in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan. It was built in 1156 AD by Rao Jaisal and has been a significant historical landmark in the region.
explanation_hi: जयसालमर हवना, आपसर कौंसल (The Golden Fort) तो एक आत्मना शहर है जिसें कृषि श्री को श्रोते हैं। 1156 AD में आपसर कृषी को बनने की खंड की त्राल श्रोते हैं।
explanation_en: The Great Indian National Park (Gir National Park) is not a city or a historical monument in Rajasthan. It is a famous national park located in Gujarat, known for its Asiatic lions. The Jaisalmer Fort was built in 1156 AD by Rao Jaisal and is a significant historical monument in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: जैसालमेर श्रोते हैं। 1156 AD में आपसर कृषी को बनने की खंड की त्राल श्रोते हैं।
